Introduction¶

These docs serve the purpose to contain all information about ATC’s P8 smartwatch custom firmware.

The P8 smartwatch has many great features like:

  • Bluetooth LE,
  • HRS 3300,
  • pedometer,
  • imu,
  • vibration motor,
  • color/touch screen,
  • has 1 external button,
  • it is waterproof

It can be programed with Arduino, and flashed through BLE without opening.

Discord Server where almost all discussion takes place

the watch can be bought on many sites like Aliexpress, ebay, gearbest or Banggood. Here are example URLs:
